name: Cloud Nine (Tomaz Saraiva)
description:
How To Play

Achieve total happiness by painting the entire brain with green neurons. Get rid of the bad thoughts (red neurons) and the bad feelings will go away!

Keys

Tap the screen to fire synapses and activate other neurons.

Hyper Casual Jam Com

This game was developed for the GDBAY Hyper Casual Jam Com with the theme of  "Feeling".

Unity

I've used Unity to create this game. Check my YouTube channel to see me working on this game in real-time.

Attributions
  • Music: VOiD1 Gaming
  • Sound Effects: Kenney
